mapper.select: SELECT FWeldWPSID FROM tb_wps_welddevices WHERE FUpdateDate=(select max(`FUpdateDate`) from tb_wps_welddevices WHERE FWeldDevicesID=#{id} group by FWeldDevicesID LIMIT 1) LIMIT 1
SELECT `Fweld_I` fstandardele,`Fweld_v` fstandardvol,`Fdiameter` fdiameter FROM tb_mainwps WHERE `FID`=#{id}

SELECT DISTINCT tb_welding_machine.fid id,`fequipment_no` fname,`fmodel` fmachinemodel FROM tb_live_data LEFT JOIN tb_welding_machine ON tb_live_data.fmachine_id=tb_welding_machine.fid WHERE tb_live_data.fwelder_id=#{weldid} AND `fequipment_no` IS NOT null
